# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About Bamboo Heaven
Bamboo Heaven is a business in the bedding and home textiles industry.

## Target Audience
- Eco-Friendly Families
- Luxury Sleep Seekers
- Allergy Sufferers
- Wellness Influencers
